pageContext.claim: “If I were a Senator or Congressman, the first person I would call to testify about the biggest political crime and scandal in the history of the USA, by FAR, is former President Obama. He knew EVERYTHING. Do it @LindseyGrahamSC, just do it. No more Mr. Nice Guy. No more talk!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump with no evidence says Obama and former vice president Joe Biden -- now his Democratic opponent in 2020 -- illegally plotted Trump's ouster before he even took office.
